name: The Endless Tap Tavern
description:
The Endless Tap Tavern is a Dungeons & Dragons-inspired fantasy text-based RPG. You and your exhausted party are in need of a respite after a long day of adventuring, leading you to the Endless Tap for an evening of drinks and relaxation. But will you find the rest that you so desperately need?

For the sheer amount of content in this monstrosity of a Twine game, I recommend at least three play-throughs for a "complete" experience.

... And yes, you can pet the dog.
